stories.headline: Kids and Violence: Behind school walls
stories.summary: This article examines the inconsistencies and discrepancies in school violence data reporting, emphasizing the difficulty in obtaining reliable information about gun-related expulsions in Indiana compared to national reports.

stories.headline: Crime and Courts: Conviction rate
stories.summary: The story investigates the unusually high plea-bargaining rate in the San Francisco DA's office under Terence Hallinan and its impact on conviction rates, using OBTS data to explore case outcomes.

stories.headline: Kids and Violence: Columbine aftermath
stories.summary: Following the Columbine shooting, this report investigates discrepancies in the reporting of school violence data in Albuquerque, revealing underreporting of crime incidents in schools.
